text: , son of Kanetsugu, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Muromachi period (1336–1573). He held a regent position kampaku from 1408 to 1409. With a commoner he had a son Fusatsugu. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1383 births Category:1454 deaths
title: Konoe Tadatsugu
